message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you consider $11,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $11,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
